## Description

[New Relic](https://newrelic.com) is a San Francisco, California-based technology company which develops cloud-based software to help website and application owners track the performances of their services.
This component allows you to send events, logs and metrics to your New Relic Account.

## Connections

### API Key

After you obtain an **API key** from your [New Relic Account Settings](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/apis/intro-apis/new-relic-api-keys/).
The New Relic **API key** can be put directly into a New Relic connection.

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      placeholder: "API Key",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "Provide the API key from the developer console.",
      example: "example187843230995241",
      key: "apiKey",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "API Key",
    },
  ]}
/>

## Actions

<div id="rawrequest" />

### Raw Request

Send raw HTTP request to New Relic | <small><b>key: rawRequest</b></small>

  inputs={[

      required: true,

      type: "string",

<div id="senddetailedlogs" />

### Send Detailed Logs

Use the Log API to send a detailed log using a custom request body to New Relic | <small><b>key: sendDetailedLogs</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      language: "json",
      comments:
        "Provide a JSON object containing the message of logs you want to send.",
      key: "codeMessage",
      type: "code",
      default:
        '{\n  "timestamp": 1562767499238,\n  "message": "{"service-name": "my-service", "user": {"id": 123, "name": "alice"}}",\n  "service-name": "my-service",\n  "user": {\n    "id": 123,\n    "name": "alice"\n  }\n}',
      label: "Message",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "newRelicConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "requestId": "6af0a5fe-0001-b000-0000"
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="sendeventdata" />

### Send Event Data

Use the Event API to send custom event data to New Relic | <small><b>key: sendEventData</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      example: "8439034",
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Provide the unique identifier of your New Relic Insights account.",
      key: "accountId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Account Id",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "Provide any key value pairs to pass with your request body.",
      key: "additionalAttributes",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Additional Attributes",
    },
    {
      example: "Purchase",
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Can be a combination of alphanumeric characters, underscores, and colons",
      key: "eventType",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Event Type",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "newRelicConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "requestId": "6af0a5fe-0001-b000-0000"
  }
}
```

<div id="sendlogs" />

### Send Logs

Use the Log API to send log data to New Relic | <small><b>key: sendLogs</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      example:
        '{"service-name": "my-service", "user": {"id": 123, "name": "alice"}}',
      required: false,
      comments:
        "Provide a JSON string containing the message of logs you want to send.",
      key: "jsonMessage",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Message",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "newRelicConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      example: "1562767499238",
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Provide a valid UNIX timestamp to be passed alongside the logs.",
      key: "timestamp",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Timestamp",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "requestId": "6af0a5fe-0001-b000-0000"
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="sendmetrics" />

### Send Metric Data

Use the Metric API to send custom metrics to the New Relic | <small><b>key: sendMetrics</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      example: "memory.heap",
      required: false,
      comments:
        "A map of key value pairs associated with this specific metric. Values can be strings, JSON numbers, or booleans. Keys are case-sensitive and must be less than 255 characters.",
      key: "attributes",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Attributes",
    },
    {
      example: "memory.heap",
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide the name of the metric you would like to report.",
      key: "metricName",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Metric Name",
    },
    {
      model: [
        {
          label: "Count",
          value: "count",
        },
        {
          label: "Distribution",
          value: "distribution",
        },
        {
          label: "Gauge",
          value: "gauge",
        },
        {
          label: "Summary",
          value: "summary",
        },
        {
          label: "Unique Count",
          value: "uniqueCount",
        },
      ],
      example: "gauge",
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Provide a string value for the type of metric you would like to report. In order to correctly chose this value refer to the list of types here: https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/data-apis/understand-data/metric-data/metric-data-type/",
      key: "metricType",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Metric Type",
    },
    {
      example: "2.3",
      required: false,
      comments: "Provide a value to report.",
      key: "metricValue",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Metric Value",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "newRelicConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      example: "1562767499238",
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Provide a valid UNIX timestamp to be passed alongside the logs.",
      key: "timestamp",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Timestamp",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "requestId": "6af0a5fe-0001-b000-0000"
  }
}
```
